files.patch:
@@ -178,1 +178,4 @@
-        run: make CONF_NAME=linux-x64 LOG_LEVEL=debug images
+        run: |
+          cat build/linux-x64/spec.gmk
+          cat build/linux-x64/hotspot-spec.gmk
+          make CONF_NAME=linux-x64 LOG_LEVEL=debug images
@@ -537,1 +540,4 @@
-        run: make CONF_NAME=linux-x86 images
+        run: |
+          cat build/linux-x86/spec.gmk
+          cat build/linux-x86/hotspot-spec.gmk
+          make CONF_NAME=linux-x86 LOG_LEVEL=debug images
@@ -821,1 +827,1 @@
-          & make CONF_NAME=windows-x64 FORCE_MSC_VER=1912 FORCE_LD_VER=1412 images
+          & make CONF_NAME=windows-x64 FORCE_MSC_VER=1912 FORCE_LD_VER=1412 LOG_LEVEL=debug images
@@ -1004,1 +1010,1 @@
-          & make CONF_NAME=windows-x86 images
+          & make CONF_NAME=windows-x86 LOG_LEVEL=debug images
@@ -1429,1 +1435,4 @@

+          cat build/macos-x64/spec.gmk
+          cat build/macos-x64/hotspot-spec.gmk
+          make CONF_NAME=macos-x64 LOG_LEVEL=debug images

@@ -127,1 +127,1 @@
-        # make sure the default include and lib dirs are appended to each 
+        # make sure the default include and lib dirs are appended to each
@@ -160,13 +160,4 @@
-  if test "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xgcc; then
-    PICFLAG="-fPIC"
-    PIEFLAG="-fPIE"
-    C_FLAG_REORDER=''
-    CXX_FLAG_REORDER=''
-
-    if test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_OS" = xmacosx; then
-      # Linking is different on MacOSX
-      SHARED_LIBRARY_FLAGS="-dynamiclib -compatibility_version 1.0.0 -current_version 1.0.0 $PICFLAG"
-      SET_EXECUTABLE_ORIGIN='-Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker @loader_path/.'
-      SET_SHARED_LIBRARY_ORIGIN="$SET_EXECUTABLE_ORIGIN"
-      SET_SHARED_LIBRARY_NAME='-Xlinker -install_name -Xlinker @rpath/[$]1'
-      SET_SHARED_LIBRARY_MAPFILE=''
+  if test "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xgcc -o "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xclang; then
+    if test "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xgcc; then
+      PICFLAG="-fPIC"
+      PIEFLAG="-fPIE"
@@ -174,6 +165,1 @@
-      # Default works for linux, might work on other platforms as well.
-      SHARED_LIBRARY_FLAGS='-shared'
-      SET_EXECUTABLE_ORIGIN='-Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker \$$$$ORIGIN[$]1'
-      SET_SHARED_LIBRARY_ORIGIN="-Xlinker -z -Xlinker origin $SET_EXECUTABLE_ORIGIN"
-      SET_SHARED_LIBRARY_NAME='-Xlinker -soname=[$]1'
-      SET_SHARED_LIBRARY_MAPFILE='-Xlinker -version-script=[$]1'
+      PICFLAG=''
@@ -181,2 +167,0 @@
-  elif test "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xclang; then
-    PICFLAG=''
@@ -369,15 +353,1 @@
-    if test "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xgcc; then
-      if test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_OS" = xmacosx; then
-        # On MacOSX we optimize for size, something
-        # we should do for all platforms?
-        C_O_FLAG_HIGHEST="-Os"
-        C_O_FLAG_HI="-Os"
-        C_O_FLAG_NORM="-Os"
-        C_O_FLAG_NONE=""
-      else
-        C_O_FLAG_HIGHEST="-O3"
-        C_O_FLAG_HI="-O3"
-        C_O_FLAG_NORM="-O2"
-        C_O_FLAG_NONE="-O0"
-      fi
-    elif test "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xclang; then
+    if test "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xgcc -o "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xclang; then
@@ -436,1 +406,1 @@
-  elif test "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xgcc; then
+  elif test "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xgcc -o "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xclang; then
@@ -515,1 +485,1 @@

+  if test "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xgcc -o "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xclang; then
@@ -518,1 +488,1 @@
-        -pipe -fstack-protector -D_GNU_SOURCE -D_REENTRANT -D_LARGEFILE64_SOURCE"
+        -pipe -fstack-protector"
@@ -532,1 +502,5 @@
-    TOOLCHAIN_CHECK_COMPILER_VERSION(6, FLAGS_SETUP_GCC6_COMPILER_FLAGS)
+
+    if test "x$TOOLCHAIN_TYPE" = xgcc; then
+      TOOLCHAIN_CHECK_COMPILER_VERSION(6, FLAGS_SETUP_GCC6_COMPILER_FLAGS)
+    fi
+

@@ -102,1 +102,1 @@
-# Control wether Hotspot runs Queens test after building
+# Control whether Hotspot runs Queens test after building
@@ -114,0 +114,4 @@
+NO_DELETE_NULL_POINTER_CHECKS_CFLAG=@NO_DELETE_NULL_POINTER_CHECKS_CFLAG@
+NO_LIFETIME_DSE_CFLAG=@NO_LIFETIME_DSE_CFLAG@
+CXXSTD_CXXFLAG=@CXXSTD_CXXFLAG@
+
@@ -116,3 +120,3 @@
-EXTRA_CFLAGS=@LEGACY_TARGET_CFLAGS@ $(NO_DELETE_NULL_POINTER_CHECKS_CFLAG) \
-				    $(NO_LIFETIME_DSE_CFLAG) $(CXXSTD_CXXFLAG)
-EXTRA_CXXFLAGS=@LEGACY_TARGET_CXXFLAGS@
+EXTRA_CXXFLAGS=@LEGACY_TARGET_CXXFLAGS@ $(NO_DELETE_NULL_POINTER_CHECKS_CFLAG) \
+				        $(NO_LIFETIME_DSE_CFLAG) $(CXXSTD_CXXFLAG)
+EXTRA_CFLAGS=@LEGACY_TARGET_CFLAGS@
@@ -122,3 +126,3 @@
-HOST_CFLAGS=@LEGACY_HOST_CFLAGS@ $(NO_DELETE_NULL_POINTER_CHECKS_CFLAG) \
-				 $(NO_LIFETIME_DSE_CFLAG) $(CXXSTD_CXXFLAG)
-HOST_CXXFLAGS=@LEGACY_HOST_CXXFLAGS@
+HOST_CXXFLAGS=@LEGACY_HOST_CXXFLAGS@ $(NO_DELETE_NULL_POINTER_CHECKS_CFLAG) \
+				     $(NO_LIFETIME_DSE_CFLAG) $(CXXSTD_CXXFLAG)
+HOST_CFLAGS=@LEGACY_HOST_CFLAGS@

@@ -114,1 +114,1 @@
-SA_LFLAGS = $(MAPFLAG:FILENAME=$(SAMAPFILE))
+  SA_LFLAGS = $(MAPFLAG:FILENAME=$(SAMAPFILE))
@@ -116,2 +116,2 @@
-# bring in minimum version argument or we'll fail on OSX 10.10
-SA_LFLAGS = $(LFLAGS)
+  # bring in minimum version argument or we'll fail on OSX 10.10
+  SA_LFLAGS = $(MAC_FLAGS)
